text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/fhir/CodeSystem/medication-fda-tw
  • Include all codes defined in https://twcore.mohw.gov.tw/fhir/CodeSystem/medication-device-fda-tw

name: TWMedicationFDA
title: 臺灣藥品及醫療器材代碼值集
description:
臺灣藥品及醫療器材許可證
